name: Humpback Whale Free
description:
★★★ Get the Full version of "Humpback Whale" for Free! ★★★

You play a Humpback Whale and you must find the fact sheets hidden in the depths of the abyss.
Each sheet contains important information about Humpback Whales.
You can control the whale with the accelerometer or using the virtual GamePad.
In easy mode, one map shows your position in real time.
Be careful not to get lost in the vast underwater ...

Game Features:
• 3D Real time rendering
• Beautiful graphics and animations
• 3 difficulty levels
• Control with the accelerometer or the virtual GamePad
• Learning through play
• Select your language: English or French
• Produced in collaboration with the Association GLOBICE specialized in the study of cetaceans
